patternMismatch.message: The value does not match the required pattern of {{constraint}}

rangeOverflow.message: The value is too big. It cannot be bigger than {{constraint}}.

rangeUnderflow.message: The value is too small. It must be at least {{constraint}}.

stepMismatch.message: The value is not in within the correct step interval of {{constraint}}

tooLong.message: The value is too long. It cannot be longer than {{constraint}} characters.

tooShort.message: The value is too short. It must be at least {{constraint}} characters long.

typeMismatch.message: The value must be of type {{constraint}}

typeMismatch[email].message: The value must be an email in the format mickey@mouse.com

typeMismatch[url].message: The value must be a URL in the format http://url.com

typeMismatch[tel].message: The value must be a phone number
